data.text: @mdasif87236824 @Vivekan50167650 @timesofindia Correct. Why not railway think about this. Pending since very long time.

@timesofindia @AshwiniVaishnaw thankyou for restoring the bedding in trains, I recently travelled on Tejas Rajdhani, whoever thought of disposable blankets was awful! Did you or any senior official use that to get the feeling?
@timesofindia रेलवे मंत्रालय को सभी ट्रेनों का संचालन भी शुरू करना चाहिए ताकि आम जनता को राहत मिल सके।

@timesofindia Election commission has allowed victory procession. So it is time for Railways to restore all facilities provided before COVID outbreak. Since Railway is the life line of the country. Ticket cancellation charges are deliberately made higher. This should be stopped immediately.
@timesofindia There is no date mentioned on notice. It says it shall be provided with immediate effect. https://t.co/gZ0Y35bCjS
@timesofindia Do the #Indian deserve only a blanket restoration by #IRCTC or subsidies restoration of #lpgcylinder  which were also been Targeted by majestic #COVID19 🤔

@timesofindia Stop special allowance n free ticketing to the MLA, MLC & MPs Becaz their Salary has soared high upto 4 to 5 lakhs per month & also they earn money by other means. Hence their special concession shall be withdrawn as they travel in 1st or 2tier AC coaches.This s real revenue loss
@timesofindia What about other unnecessary fare increments such that charges on ticket cancellation, basic ticket fare, plateform ticket and yes obviously the special concession to senior citizens??
@timesofindia Half and suspence news with out date,hahah
